name: Big Boos Haunt Beta
description: The original version of Big Boo's Haunt, which was eventually entirely redone.

name: Bomberman Battle
description: One of the attempts at a Bomberman stage.

name: Beta Conker
description: Version of Conker with different Up Special, Neutral Special, Jabs, and Up Smash.

name: Dark Samus Experimental
description: Experimental version of Dark Samus with different Neutral Special, Up Special, and attributes.

name: DK Jr.
description: DK Jr. model imported over Donkey Kong.

name: DK Jr. Stage Music
description: Music intended for the DK Jr. stage. This file can be imported directly into Super Smash Bros., but cannot be played with standard music software.

name: LTC Stage
description: Altered version of Pok√©mon Stadium for the Low Tide City Smash Remix tournament, which was ultimately cancelled.

name: Mario Bros. Stage
description: Mario Bros. stage based on its appearance in modern games.

name: Meowth
description: Meowth model imported over Fox.

name: Moonside
description: Moonside stage.

name: Moray Towers
description: Moray Towers stage.

name: Pichu
description: Pichu model imported over Pikachu.

name: Raichu
description: Raichu model imported over Pikachu.

name: Remix Race to the Finish Beta
description: The original version of Remix Race to the Finish.

name: Spirit Temple
description: Spirit Temple stage intended for the original Ganondorf release.

name: Super Smash Bird
description: Mod created by Fray that predates Remix and served as inspiration for Falco in Smash Remix.

name: Tazmilly
description: Tazmilly stage intended for Lucas, later replaced by Osohe.

name: Uncanny Mansion
description: Uncanny Mansion stage intended for Wario.

name: Waluigi
description: Waluigi model imported over Mario.

name: Wario Castle
description: Wario Castle stage.
